# Blocking of Google Products in Tanzania

This notebook shows the blocking of multiple Google Products in Tanzania on October 27, 2020.

The data is from the Google Transparency Report: https://transparencyreport.google.com/traffic/overview?fraction_traffic=start:1602460800000;product:21;region:TZ&lu=fraction_traffic
source.a29facda: As you can see in the chart, multiple products got blocked simultaneously.
source.9c4ded9e:
## Tor Traffic
You can see that the Tor traffic during the event went up, when the traffic for some Google services was disrupted, which is another evidence of a censorship event.
